content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs. But, yes, societal expectations continue to impact people's decisions and behavior today, although the specifics have changed over time. Society still sets certain standards and imposes expectations on individuals, particularly on how to act, dress, and speak. This is particularly true for marginalized groups, such as women, people of color, and LGBTQ+ individuals, who still face discrimination and disproportionate pressure to conform to societal norms.
